title: LanguageAI Toolkit
description: An open-source toolkit for developing and evaluating natural language processing models with a focus on interpretability and fairness.
longDescription: The LanguageAI Toolkit provides researchers and practitioners with a comprehensive set of tools for building, training, and evaluating NLP models. It includes modules for data preprocessing, model training, evaluation metrics, and visualization of results.

title: Neural Text Analytics Platform
description: A comprehensive framework for analyzing large-scale text data using state-of-the-art deep learning models and visualization techniques.
longDescription: This platform enables researchers to perform advanced text analytics on large datasets. It includes tools for topic modeling, sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and interactive visualization of results.

title: Collaborative AI Research Platform
description: A collaborative platform enabling researchers to share datasets, models, and experimental results in a reproducible manner.
longDescription: This platform facilitates collaboration between AI researchers by providing tools for dataset sharing, experiment tracking, model versioning, and result reproduction. It aims to improve the reproducibility crisis in AI research.

title: Multilingual Sentiment Analysis
description: Cross-lingual sentiment analysis system supporting 15+ languages with state-of-the-art accuracy.
longDescription: This project developed advanced techniques for sentiment analysis across multiple languages, focusing on low-resource languages and cross-lingual transfer learning.

title: Educational AI Assistant
description: An AI-powered teaching assistant that helps students with computer science coursework and provides personalized feedback.
longDescription: This project aims to create an intelligent tutoring system that can assist students in learning computer science concepts, provide code reviews, and offer personalized study recommendations.

title: Ethical AI Framework
description: A comprehensive framework for evaluating and ensuring ethical AI development and deployment.
longDescription: This project develops tools and methodologies for assessing AI systems for bias, fairness, transparency, and social impact. It includes guidelines, evaluation metrics, and software tools.
